title: THE CROWN Season 4 Ending Explained! Real Life History and Season 5 New Actors!
author: Think Story
comment: i hate how charles gets mad at diana for cheating on him but he was cheating on her from the start JDJEBDDI
this season REALLY makes the viewers resent the royal family. great job with the writing and introducing diana and thatcher.
Season 4 shows just how childish Charles really is and how cold the Royal family are.
I LOVEEE how they made Prince Andrew creepy as hell. the shade the writing throws is incredible. it's like you pick up on it, it's not in your face, but you know what it means.
Charles is really a jealous brat. He also blamed Diana for “hurting” Camilla.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and explain Season 4 of Netflix/Peter Morgan's "The Crown" reviewing it's connection to the real royal family and what it could mean for season 5 including new actors!

26 Key Differences Between The Crown Season 4 and Real Life:
